string.value: Cassandra says something went wrong on Gold Richie's Treasure Island. Rush over to #bCassandra# and talk to her.
If you need a compass to give you directions to Treasure Island, talk to Cassandra.
If you've collected #bN,E,W,S for the Compass#k from the monsters, double-click the #b#t2430007##k to make a #t2430008# which will take you to Gold Richie's Treasure Island.
Seriously, what would Maple World do without Cassandra? Not a day goes by without some mess I have to clean up. What, are you curious?

The wealthiest man in Maple World, Gold Richie, is looking for help. Goldrich's Treasure Vault has been invaded by some Pigs that have been eating his treasures. Well, not that you're my first choice or anything, but since I don't have anyone else to ask... Will you go and take care of this? Who knows? You might be able to get some treasures. Oh, make sure you have at least 1 slot open in your Inventory!
If you're not into treasures... then never mind.

I only have the #t2430007#. But if you collect #b#t3994102#, #t3994103#, #t3994104#, #t3994105##k from the monsters and double-click the #b#t2430007##k I give you, you'll be able to make the #b#t2430008##k that will give you access to Goldrich's Treasure Vault. Just remember that you'll be returned to a town close to Gold Richie's Treasure Vault.
